about_the_game:
Play as Albert Longtooth, proud son of the mysteriously disappeared inventors Dr. & Dr. Longtooth. They have left you with a fully functional laboratory and an almost finished mind controlling technology. Lead a revolution by transforming regular citizens into fearless brain chipped warriors!



Have you ever tried to craft brain chips to control a bunch of minions? It’s hard … like really hard! A good mad scientist knows that science needs trials and errors. Your chips may have some slight defects, like burning your minions, or making them explode. But you’ll get better as you practice.



As you watch your team fight, trigger their chips at the right moment for maximum efficiency! Is Clyde surrounded by enemies? Time for a deadly spin attack. Are all the enemies on the same line? Time for Frank’s ultra-beam!
detailed_description:
Play as Albert Longtooth, proud son of the mysteriously disappeared inventors Dr. & Dr. Longtooth. They have left you with a fully functional laboratory and an almost finished mind controlling technology. Lead a revolution by transforming regular citizens into fearless brain chipped warriors!



Have you ever tried to craft brain chips to control a bunch of minions? It’s hard … like really hard! A good mad scientist knows that science needs trials and errors. Your chips may have some slight defects, like burning your minions, or making them explode. But you’ll get better as you practice.



As you watch your team fight, trigger their chips at the right moment for maximum efficiency! Is Clyde surrounded by enemies? Time for a deadly spin attack. Are all the enemies on the same line? Time for Frank’s ultra-beam!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500(4*3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeaon R9 M390 (2048 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600(4*3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeaon Pro 570 (4096 VRAM) or equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: They're Not Monsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240(2*3400) / AMD FX-4300(4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560Ti (1024 VRAM) / Radeaon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM) / Radeaon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: They're Not Monsters is a real-time Roguelike where you play as a mad scientist raising and controlling commandos of mutant rabbits. Activate chips in their brains, and go reconquer your kingdom... scientifically!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Greek, Japanese, Russian, Turkish
